meanings.definition: A type of flowering plant with large, brightly colored petals.
meanings.sent1: In the garden, the tulips bloomed beautifully in the spring.
meanings.sent2: She picked a bouquet of tulips to brighten up the room.
meanings.sent3: The tulips seemed to dance in the gentle breeze, showing off their vibrant colors.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as radiant as a field of tulips in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the tulips in the garden was like a painting come to life.

meanings.definition: The bulb of this plant, often used for planting in gardens.
meanings.sent1: She carefully planted the tulip bulbs in neat rows in the soil.
meanings.sent2: The tulip bulbs were stored in a cool, dark place until it was time to plant them.
meanings.sent3: When the squirrel dug up the tulip bulbs, it looked like a tiny treasure hunt in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The tulip bulbs held the promise of colorful blooms in the coming season.
meanings.sent5: The tulip bulbs were like small packages of beauty waiting to be unwrapped by nature.
